```{r}
a <- 5
b <- 13
c_sq <- (a*a) + (b*b)
c <- sqrt(c_sq)
print(c)

pyth <- function(a, b) {
  c_sq <- (a*a) + (b*b)
  sqrt(c_sq)
  # Do not need to return manually
  #c <- sqrt(c_sq)
 #return(c)
}
pyth(a = 5, b = 13)
```

## Sequences

```{r}
x1 = 1:10
```
```{r}
x2 = 1:12
x2[0]
x2[2]
```
```{r}
x3 = seq(from = 1, to = 10, by = 2)
x3
```
```{r}
x4 = seq(from = 1, by = 2, length.out = 19)
length(x4)
rep(1, 10)
```
```{r}
seq(from = -6, to = 6, by = 2)
x <- seq(from = -4.8, to = -3.43, length.out = 8)
length(x)
```
